actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

official_title: To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate the Nulhegan River and Paul Stream in the State of Vermont for potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system, and for other purposes.
short_title: Nulhegan River and Paul Stream Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2022
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

summary.text:
Nulhegan River and Paul Stream Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2022

This bill designates for study specified segments of the Nulhegan River and Paul Stream in Vermont for potential addition to the Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: Nulhegan River and Paul Stream Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2022
Nulhegan River and Paul Stream Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2022

To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate the Nulhegan River and Paul Stream in the State of Vermont for potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system, and for other purposes.
